txt.en: 'Drúedain need hides for wraps and shelter. Kill evil Wargs and get hides. Drúedain pleased at [placeholder] for bringing hides.'
Collect Warg hides in Taur Drúadan ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gnô-buri-Krûg is in need of more hides for the village of Drû Bhûta.
'Kind [placeholder], you are. True friend to Drúedain.'
Bring the Warg hides to Gnô-buri-Krûg
Warg hides can be found from defeating Wargs in Taur Drúadan.\n\nYou should defeat Wargs to collect their hides.
Gnô-buri-Krûg can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should bring the Warg hides to Gnô-buri-Krûg.
